author: stevel
msg: adding xdoclet markup to the files, so we can autogenerate web.xml. We do not actually do that for axis yet; this little hack is here so that if you have your own webapp that uses xdoclet to create its web.xml, you can include the axis source to get the axis stuff in there too. Plus we may want xdoclet in the future, as it is brill.

author: stevel
msg: a quick raid by the curly bracket police
